skill.name: picture-book-wizard
skill.description: A specialized skill for generating high-quality, consistent children's bilingual picture books using 'banana nano'. Supports 18 visual styles across 4 categories (7 core children's book styles, 5 atmospheric styles, 5 Chinese cultural styles, 1 specialized), 12 scenes (5 nature + 7 cultural), age-driven dynamic content system (ages 3-12), and expanded learning domains (science, math, history, psychology, etc.). Use when the user wants to create picture book stories, prompts, or learning materials.
skill.summary: Generate bilingual children's picture books with consistent visual styles and age-appropriate content.
skill.author: kart-io

security_audit.summary: All static findings are FALSE POSITIVES. The 'Ruby/shell backtick' detections are in markdown template files describing output formats, not actual code execution. 'Windows SAM database' references are content descriptions in YAML configuration files. No actual command execution, network access, or credential exposure. This is a content generation skill for children's picture books.

low_findings.title: False Positive: Template Syntax in Documentation
low_findings.description: Static scanner detected 'Ruby/shell backtick execution' in markdown template files. These are NOT code execution - they are backtick-delimited code blocks in documentation describing output formats for the picture book generation system.

low_findings.title: False Positive: Content References in YAML
low_findings.description: Static scanner detected 'Windows SAM database' patterns in YAML configuration files. These are content descriptors (character names, scene descriptions) in the picture book generation system, not actual credential or system file access.

content.user_title: Create bilingual picture books for children
content.value_statement: Creating engaging, educational picture books for children requires careful attention to visual consistency, age-appropriate content, and cultural relevance. This skill generates high-quality bilingual picture book content with 18 visual styles and 12 scene types, tailored for ages 3-12.
actual_capabilities: Generate age-appropriate bilingual story content for children ages 3-12
Apply 18 visual styles across 4 categories for consistent illustrations
Create 12 scene types including nature and cultural themes
Structure stories with proper narrative arc and character development
Support expanded learning domains: science, math, history, psychology
Validate content for safety and age-appropriateness
limitations: Does not generate actual images - creates text prompts for image generation
Content is text-based; actual book rendering requires additional tools
Cannot access external APIs or databases for real-time content
Limited to pre-defined visual styles and scene configurations

use_cases.title: Create educational bedtime stories
use_cases.description: Generate bilingual bedtime stories that teach children new concepts while entertaining them with age-appropriate narratives.
use_cases.target_user: Parents and educators seeking educational content

use_cases.title: Develop cultural heritage learning materials
use_cases.description: Create picture books featuring Chinese cultural scenes and traditions for language and cultural education.

use_cases.title: Build custom story collections
use_cases.description: Develop themed picture book series for specific learning objectives or entertainment purposes.

prompt_templates.title: Simple story request
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a short picture book story about [TOPIC] for a [AGE]-year-old child. Include [PAGE_COUNT] pages.

prompt_templates.title: Cultural theme story
prompt_templates.prompt: Write a bilingual picture book featuring [CULTURAL_THEME] for children ages [AGE_RANGE]. Include [NUMBER] scenes with [STYLE] visual style.

prompt_templates.title: Educational learning book
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate a picture book that teaches [SUBJECT] to [AGE]-year-olds using a [STYLE] art style. Include [PAGES] pages with learning objectives.

prompt_templates.title: Series development
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a series of [COUNT] connected picture books about [THEME]. Each book should have [PAGES] pages and feature consistent characters and visual style.

output_examples.input: Create a 5-page picture book about kindness for a 5-year-old.
output: Page 1: Little Rabbit found a lost mitten on the path...
Page 2: Rabbit asked Squirrel, 'Is this yours?'...
Page 3: Squirrel thanked Rabbit with a warm smile...
Page 4: Together they found more friends to help...
Page 5: Kindness made the forest happy for everyone!

output_examples.input: Write a Chinese New Year story for ages 6-8 in Chinese and English.
output: Scene 1: Red lanterns hung from every door...
Scene 2: Xiaoming received a red envelope...
Scene 3: Family gathered for reunion dinner...
Scene 4: Fireworks lit up the night sky...

best_practices: Specify the child's age range to ensure age-appropriate vocabulary and concepts
Include cultural context when requesting culturally-specific content
Request specific visual styles that match your intended audience
anti_patterns: Asking for graphic or frightening content for young children
Requesting complex themes without age specifications
Expecting the skill to generate actual images rather than text prompts

faq.question: Can this skill create actual picture books with images?
faq.answer: No, this skill generates text content including story text, scene descriptions, and image prompts. You would use the generated prompts with an image generation tool to create the illustrations.

faq.question: What age ranges are supported?
faq.answer: The skill supports children ages 3-12, with content automatically adjusted for vocabulary complexity, theme depth, and narrative structure.

faq.question: How many languages are supported?
faq.answer: The skill is designed for bilingual content generation, commonly English and Chinese, but can be adapted for other language combinations.

faq.question: Can I customize the visual styles?
faq.answer: Yes, 18 visual styles are available including children's book illustrations, atmospheric styles, and Chinese cultural art styles.

faq.question: Does this skill work with other Claude tools?
faq.answer: Yes, this skill is compatible with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code for seamless integration into various workflows.

faq.question: What learning domains are covered?
faq.answer: The skill supports content for science, mathematics, history, psychology, and other educational domains through age-appropriate storytelling.
